Claim: "A group of young men in a gym take turns scoring in basketball."
Referring expressions: young men, gym, basketball  Guys, indoors
Formula: (exists a ((IsInGym(a) and TakesTurns(a)) and ScoresInBasketball(a)) & (forall f (forall g ( IsIndoors(f) ->   TakesTurns(g))))) -> (exists d (IsIndoors(d)))
